ya EqvaM ~MvEdaiqSha tE# rudraBAqgO yaM niqrayA#cathAqstaM ju#Shasva viqdErgau#paqtya(gm) 
rAqyaspOSha(gm)# suqvIrya(gm)# saM~MvathsaqrINA(gg)# svaqstiM || manu#H puqtrEByO# dAqyaM ~Mvya#Bajaqth sa nABAqnEdi#ShThaM brahmaqcaryaqM ~Mvasa#ntaqM nira#Bajaqth sa A&ga#cCaqth sO$&bravIt kaqthA mAq nira#BAqgitiq na tvAq nira#BAkShaqmitya#-bravIqda~ggi#rasa iqmE saqtramA#satEq tE - [  ]   29
